title: Verify that OR waivers secured during 4th OR waiver Period are secured until the correct date/time
custom_preconds:
GIVEN BOC user is attempting to send a result bulletin containing unclaimed OR waivers for a player
AND player is not optioned
AND Claim Period Expiration Date for the bulletin is within 4th Outright Assignment Waiver Period (Based on system dates screen, 08/01/2017-08/31/2017 in PRD)
custom_steps: WHEN BOC User sends the results bulletin
custom_expected:
THEN OR waivers should be Secured Until Midnight on the last day of the 4th OR waiver period 
AND Last date of the 4th OR waiver period should be based on system dates screen (08/31/2017 in PRD)(Ex: "Secured until [Thu] [Aug] [31], Midnight ET [2017].")

title: Verify that OR waivers secured during 4th OR waiver Period are secured until the correct date/time - Optioned Player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN BOC user is attempting to send a result bulletin containing unclaimed OR waivers for a player
AND player IS optioned
AND Claim Period Expiration Date for the bulletin is within 4th Outright Assignment Waiver Period (Based on system dates screen, 08/01/2017-08/31/2017 in PRD)
custom_steps: WHEN BOC User sends the results bulletin
custom_expected: THEN OR waivers should be Secured Until 1pm on the third day after the secure date (date the result bulletin is sent)(EX:"Secured Until Fri Aug 04, 13:00 ET 2017" if result bulletin is sent on 08/01)

title: Verify that TRD Waivers Required error message fires for outright(Trade) after 8/1
Verify that players with TRD waivers secured are able to be traded after 8/1
